eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.categorical

Class CategoricalSimSearch<K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.categorical.CategoricalSimSearch<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type variable representing the keys of the indexed objects.
    V - Type variable representing the values (sets of tokens) of the indexed objects.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISimSearch<K,V>

    public class CategoricalSimSearch<K extends java.lang.Comparable<? super K>,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISimSearch<K,V>
    Implements kNN similarity search against a collection of sets of tokens indexed by an inverted index. Processing logic is similar to the one in All Pairs algorithm for set similarity joins

      • compute

        public long compute(IntSetCollection queryCollection,
                    IntSetCollection targetCollection,
                    int k,
                    java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result> results)
        Computes the top-k most similar results. FIXME: Process does not actually work progressively; it must collect the top-k most similar results before issuing them
        Parameters:
        queryCollection - The (transformed) collection of tokens specified by the query.
        targetCollection - The (transformed) collection of the sets of tokens in the dataset.
        k - The number of results to fetch, i.e., those with the top-k (highest) similarity scores.
        results - Queue to collect query results.
        Returns:
        The number of collected results.
